sound.logPattern: (.+): Indoors, outdoors\. It's all the same to me as long as the weather's fine\.
(.+): Seems a pleasant enough day out there\.
(.+): (.+) rules (.+)\. (.+) is ((lady)|(lord)). I don't care one way or another\. The seat of (.+) is also located here\.
(.+): There are guards in the mead hall a short walk to the ((west)|(north)|(east)|(south))\.
(.+): (.+) is not at war with us, but there is ill-will between our peoples\. The trouble started because of a dispute over the treatment of plants\.
(.+): This is (.+)\. In [0-9]+, I ruled from (.+) of (.+) in (.+)\.
(.+): Not (.+) ago, (.+) became overlord of (.+)\.
(.+): (.+) is far to the ((west)|(north)|(east)|(south))\. \[You receive a detailed description\.\]
(.+): A (.+) ago, (.+) was kidnapped from (.+) by (.+)\.
(.+): A bandit gang led by (.+) has been harassing people over in (.+)\.
(.+): Well, let's see\.\.\. we've got abductions\.
(.+): Several years ago, (.+) was kidnapped from (.+) by (.+)\.
(.+): Particular outlaws have been causing us much hardship\. They have a tomb called (.+) somewhere in (.+)\.
(.+): A creature of the night has our people cowering in fear\. (.+) is in (.+)\. Seek this place if you hunt (.+) the (.+)\. This vile fiend has killed (.+) in her lust for murder!
(.+): A creature of the night has our people cowering in fear\. (.+) is in (.+)\. Seek this place if you hunt (.+) the (.+)\. This vile fiend murdered (.+)!
(.+): Our people have been tormented by a fearsome foe\. (.+) is in (.+)\. Seek this place if you hunt (.+) the (.+) the minotaur. This vile fiend has killed (.+) in his lust for murder!
(.+): Well, let's see\.\.\. we've got armies on the march, beasts, criminals, bandits and skulking vermin\.
(.+): Malicious outlaws have brought terror to our doorsteps\. They have a camp called (.+) somewhere in (.+)\.
(.+): This must be stopped by any means at our disposal\.
(.+): A great beast threatens to bring ruin upon our people\. (.+) is (.+)\. Seek this place if you hunt (.+)\. This vile fiend murdered (.+)!
